summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5442 for the improvement of Pike Place, or in An Easement on the Private Property Abutting Thereon, from Pike Street to a connection with the existing wall on the easterly margin of Western Avenue; by constructing a retaining wall under Ordinance No. 68531 as amended by Ordinance No. 69248, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
